an5.159:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an5.159:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma udayi mahatiya gihiparisaya parivuto dhammam desento nisinno hoti.
an5.159:1.4: Addasa kho ayasma anando ayasmantam udayim mahatiya gihiparisaya parivutam dhammam desentam nisinnam.
an5.159:1.5: Disva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.159:1.6: “ayasma, bhante, udayi mahatiya gihiparisaya parivuto dhammam deseti”ti.
an5.159:2.1: “Na kho, ananda, sukaram paresam dhammam desetum.
an5.159:2.2: Paresam, ananda, dhammam desentena panca dhamme ajjhattam upatthapetva paresam dhammo desetabbo.
an5.159:2.6: ‘anuddayatam paticca katham kathessami’ti paresam dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:2.7: ‘na amisantaro katham kathessami’ti paresam dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:2.8: ‘attananca paranca anupahacca katham kathessami’ti paresam dhammo desetabbo.
an5.159:2.9: Na kho, ananda, sukaram paresam dhammam desetum.
an5.159:2.10: Paresam, ananda, dhammam desentena ime panca dhamme ajjhattam upatthapetva paresam dhammo desetabbo”ti.
